detailsDescription.after: for naming: your e-services will be easier to find and clearer in their goals

validation.duplicate: You already created an e-service with this name. Use a different one.
validation.emptyNotAvailable: Add a word to differentiate your e-service.

eserviceDescriptionField.label: E-service description
eserviceDescriptionField.infoLabel: Include input and output data in the description. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

DELIVER.label: Does the e-service deliver personal data?

RECEIVE.label: Does the e-service receive personal data?

eservicePersonalDataField.alertMissingPersonalData: You cannot publish this draft because the template creator did not indicate whether the e-service processes personal data. Contact {{tenantName}} to request a modification of this template.

delegationSection.title: Delegations
delegationSection.description: Read the <1>documentation</1> relating to how delegations work

delegationField.label: Can the e-service be used via delegation?
delegationField.switchLabel: I authorize that users of the e-service can delegate other entities to register on their behalf

clientAccessDelegableField.label: I authorize access to the delegated data
clientAccessDelegableField.checkboxLabel: I authorize delegates to associate their clients with the purposes they have created as delegates for use. Read the <1>documentation</1> for further information

step1.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfo: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the first version of this e-service is published

stepPurpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the publication of the first version of the e-service

purposeTableSection.title: Purpose
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you will need to complete a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.descriptionEServiceFromTemplate: You can view the risk analyses associated with this template.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: You must indicate at least one purpose to continue

purposeTable.expiredRulesetTooltip: This risk analysis uses an obsolete version that you cannot publish. Remove it and create a new one
purposeTable.nextExpiringRulesetTooltip: This risk analysis uses a version that will expire in {{days}} days. Publish the e-service by {{expirationDate}} to avoid having to recompile it, or create a new one now.

riskAnalysisNameSection.title: Purpose
riskAnalysisNameSection.description: Indicate a use case for which you intend to collect data and complete the risk analysis.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: The questions in the questionnaire will vary based on the answers provided gradually. If you change the answer to a previous question, subsequent questions may change.
riskAnalysisSection.personalDataAlert: Be careful not to enter personal data in the free text fields

audienceField.label: Audience
audienceField.infoLabel: Represents the recipient of the voucher, i.e. your target resource. Doubts? <1>Read the guide</1>

thresholdSection.title: Threshold of calls expected for consumers

validation.min: This value cannot be below the threshold set for the API calls/day for each consumer

agreementApprovalPolicySection.title: Do you want to manually activate all the fruition requests received?
agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Yes, I will activate them manually

step3.attributesDescription: Please indicate all the certified, verified, and declared attributes that the consumer must have in order to create an agreement for the e-service

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Once created, the attribute will be available in the list to be added to an e-service

description.soap: Compile following fields and WASDL will be automatically generated

summary.missingPersonalDataField: This e-service draft does not indicate whether personal data will be processed.

rejectedDelegatedVersionDraftAlert.delegate: The publication of this draft was rejected by the delegator. <1>Read the reasons for rejection</1> and resend the draft with the corrections.
rejectedDelegatedVersionDraftAlert.delegator: You have rejected the publication of this draft. <1>Read the reasons for rejection here</1>.

alertMissingPersonalData.eserviceTemplateLabel: This e-service is derived from a template that does not comply with the new requirements regarding personal data processing. To unlock publication, the creator of the e-service template must update the field. Please contact them to request the necessary integration.
alertMissingPersonalData.eserviceLabel:
To be able to publish the e-service, its compilation must be updated to comply with the new requirements regarding personal data processing.

Please reject the publication request. The e-service will revert to draft status for integration by the delegated body. Once ready, you will receive a new request for approval.

importVersionDrawer.description: Before proceeding, check the following sections, then confirm and proceed.

attributeInfoSection.label: Attributes
attributeInfoSection.description: If your e-service includes attributes, you will have to insert them from scratch after uploading this zip.

eserviceTitleInfoSection.label: E-service title duplicate
eserviceTitleInfoSection.description: If there already exists an e-service provided by your institution with the same name as the one inserted in this zip, the upload will not be successful.

structureInfoSection.label: Archive structure

alert.deprecated: This e-service version is obsolete but still active. It will be automatically discontinued by PDND Interoperabilità when the last agreement on this version is archived.
